title: Why the woman does not answer

content.question: At the end of the conversation, why does the woman not answer the manâ€™s question?

choices.label: She wants the man to find the answer for himself.
She thinks that he is just pretending to be interested.
She is worried that the answer will upset him.
She thinks he should already know the answer.

content.answer: She wants the man to find the answer for himself.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
